name: Surf Excel Laundry Detergent Powder, Comfort
description: Surf Excel believes that every stain a child brings home is an experience and a value learned. If a child learns something and gets dirty in that process, then Dirt is Good. To clean these difficult stains you do not need to put in extra effort. With Surf Excel you can remove multiple stains easily and quickly without much effort. Surf provides a brilliant clean that leaves your clothes spotless and it also has a great fragrance. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
